alert.note: Alert for Adams (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT ADAMS COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gettysburg to Emmitsburg. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Hanover, Gettysburg, Hampton, Littlestown, Carroll Valley, McSherrystown, Lake Meade, Bonneauville, New Oxford, East Berlin, Lake Heritage, Abbottstown, York Springs, Heidlersburg, Hunterstown, Fairfield, Two Taverns, Liberty Mountain Resort, Gettysburg National Military Park and Gettysburg College. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
